entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • macOS: Using `\r` at the start of a string passed to `Console.Write()` call allows writing to the row *above* the one indicated as current by `Console.CursorTop` #84808
  • CoreCLR native build on Linux / Linux_musl arm64 / arm causes clang crashes #84802
  • Cancellation Token is not passed to ReadAsync #84801
  • SslStress build fails on Windows #84800
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'likelihood >= 0.0' during 'Profile incorporation' #84798
    8.0.0
  • Decide on linker to use in runtime builds #84794
  • [wasm] 2 runtime tests failing with emscripten 3.1.34 #84786
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make RegexRunner.CharInClass public instead of protected #84783
    8.0.0
  • jitformat failing on linux x64 #84780
    8.0.0
  • XmlSerializer.GenerateSerializer alternate API in .NET Core #84777
  • Optimize IPv6 IPAddress storage #84776
    Future
  • [mono][wasm] System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests assert equal failure #84775
    8.0.0
  • HelloWorld console app build failed on ppc64le with .NET8 Preview3 #84771
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests failure #84767
    8.0.0
  • Some DateTimeTest format tests fail on the upcoming Fedora 39 #84763
  • Tons of double writes because of intellisense xml docs binplacing #84762
    8.0.0
  • Performance regression observed for RSA.ImportParameters in Ubuntu when upgrading from .Net Core 3.1 to .Net 6 #84760
  • about linux-arm9 #84759
  • Publishing for linux-arm64 on Linux x64 with NativeAot and StripSymbols uses objcopy instead of aarch64-linux-gnu-objcopy #84769
  • Repeated generation of same interface (name) causes InvalidCastException with DispatchProxy.Create #84755
  • Test failure readytorun\\determinism\\crossgen2determinism\\crossgen2determinism #84752
  • Test failure profiler\\elt\\slowpatheltenter\\slowpatheltenter.cmd #84750
  • Is vxsort with workstation GC a common scenario? #84749
  • Assertion failed 'refPosition->RegOptional()' #84747
    8.0.0
  • arm64 JitStressRegs8 VectorTableLookup test failures #84746
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Try improved method for generating bounded random integers #75395
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: APIs to expose managed objects to COM #83471
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: COM source generator APIs #79121
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient is eating useful exception information #84712
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Reflection.Invoke #74938
    8.0.0
  • [Android] .Net Maui 7 self signed certificates not work #84785
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PhysicalAddressTests #57295
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator Does Not Seem to Work With .NET Framework 4.8 #84376
  • [Perf] Changes at 12/26/2021 10:58:11 AM #63456
    8.0.0
  • Cache `EndPoint.ToString()` #84515
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!call->IsExpRuntimeLookup()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #84758
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Int128 IPAddress.GetAddress() #83971
  • [wasm] Provisioning issue - could not find a chrome snapshot folder #84774
  • [wasi] Unable to install `wasi-experimental` workload #84707
  • Add the ability for a native host to load an assembly and specify the load context #77696
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher matches no file in Docker #49645
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Opt-out of default target framework filtering in source-build infra #84811
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NO-MERGE] testing #84810
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update container for building rpms to be based on mariner #84809
    area-Setup
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84807
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84806
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • Add Parallel.ForAsync #84804
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NO-MERGE] Test PR #84803
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use 128gb for regions_range on RISCV64 #84797
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix enterprise linux build #84795
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix BigInteger parse hex strings on negative numbers #84792
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implementing GetElement, ToScalar, and WithElement for Vector512 #84791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use net6.0 SqlClient TFM under source-build #84782
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Disable corelib crossgen2 #84781
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Complex #84779
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix indirection for RunInitializers when target does not support relative pointers #84778
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Test perf without AndNot #84773
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Don't re-instrument methods which don't need that #84772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Almost complete sync of logic for generating DAM/RUC reflection access warnings between ILLink and NativeAOT #84770
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix a number of issues related to boxed value serialization #84768
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84761
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Report contents of chained resolvers in exception messages. #84757
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • fix(76268): Fix invalid behavior for ignored properties with "new" mo… #84756
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [WIP][RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Move our RHEL7-based runtime dependencies packages to instead be built for CentOS Stream/OracleLinux/RHEL 8. #84805
    blocking, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix clang tool downloads #84799
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move COM source generator APIs to System.Runtime.InteropServices.dll #84329
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Always include the original exception in HttpClient #84717
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Remove VS nupkg push #84796
    needs-area-label
  • Fix handling of load for msquic and search paths for nativeaot and mono #84663
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add Array marshalling tests for ComInterfaceGenerator #84509
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [mono] permission denied when reading a jitdump file #82520
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Check that array element size fits in 16 bits #84751
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete support for cloned types #84753
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: extend initial profile repair to more cases #84741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove usage of Newtonsoft.Json from host test assets #84745
    test-enhancement, area-Host

Updated

  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on all the numeric types in corelib #84587
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize GDV checks for objects with known type #84661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Memory Diagnostics: GC Bookkeeping #84454
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid clearing mark array when it was not committed #84734
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Dogfood ComInterfaceGenerator in crossgen2 #84643
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Generate SslConnectionInfo.Unix.cs with T4 template #84690
    area-System.Net.Security, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • [Release/7.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 7.0 #84679
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.7
  • Initial work to enable native events in EventPipe #84318
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Propagate LibrariesConfiguration to LibraryImportGenerator project reference #84666
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine `cmp` and shift ops into a single `cmp` op #84605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [JIT] ARM32/ARM64 - Fixed zero/sign-extension for `GT_STORE_LCL_VAR` in codegen #84716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #84604
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement locale native functions #84417
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Handle not compatible parameters to IndexOf #84692
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable 2 failing tests for 6.0 #84726
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 6.0 #84680
    Servicing-approved, breaking-change, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 6.0.18
  • [release/6.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 6.0 #84681
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.18
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.34 #83998
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][jit] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsic on ARM64 with miniJIT #84345
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • OSDescription.Linux: return a user-friendly name based on /etc/os-release. #83976
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` support interning #84695
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Making sure we have at least one region per gen during plan phase #83076
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.Dot as intrinsic for arm64. #84245
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Minimal blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243

  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #84471

  • [browser] fix trimming of `LegacyExports` with `WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop` #83664

  • Fix type initialization ordering under R2R #84275

    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • SHA3 #84132

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI drops internal ctor #31776
  • GenAPI produces incorrect explicit interface implementations with new keyword #31774

Closed

  • dotnet publish doesn't delete old dlls #16091
  • The framework 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App', version '3.1.0' was not found. #31770

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31786

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • Add `-aot` parameter to the console template #31739

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VB.Net "Convert to Full Property" - "New" key word will not move to field #67800
  • Folded Ref Structs with Fixed Buffer causes System.AccessViolationException. #67799
  • [Proposal]: breaking point for C# Primary Constructor #67796
  • Auto-discovery of editorconfig and globalconfig files doesn't work when compile files are defined outside a project file #67793
  • Remove unnecessary usages of disposal for pooled objects in compiler #67790
    Compiler.Next
  • BindingDiagnosticBags should be pooled #67785
    17.7

Closed

  • Question: how could I compile code with source generator #67296
  • SymbolDisplayFormat: use '+' to separate nested types #67797
  • An object reference is required in nameof in attribute usage #40229
  • 'Convert to interpolated string' should not be offered for C# language version prior to 10.0 if a constant string is required #67792
  • Roslyn emits conv.i for nuint conversion #67746

PullRequests

Created

  • Include matched spans in our 'container' pattern matcher #67813
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid allocating delegates when formatting trees. #67812
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • New contracts #67811
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Fix server crash if inlay hint entry not in cache #67810
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • More source build work #67809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references (#6… #67808
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify val pipeline for RPS regression testing #67803
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dummy #67802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update `nameof` feature status #67794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Interceptors more #67786
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Eliminate intermediate pooling in CreateNodeOperations #67795
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fixing source build #67805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in 'add import'. #67787
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add ServerGC option #67804
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Only modify the linked document once in LSP code action #67784
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations of StateForCase instances #67779
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Source build fixes #67747
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Incrementally update dependency graph for new cases #67781
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Avoid realizing SyntaxReference[] in source methods #67750
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary Location object allocations when checking lang versions. #67773
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merges/main to features/interceptors #67782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Correct generate rename code action in LSP #67731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Not for review - Merged branch of all perf work. #67730
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Defer creation of Location objects to the point they are actually needed. #67742
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations of StateForCase instances. #67778
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Switch to TemporaryArrays while topologically sorting graphs #67780
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Respond to IL2026 warnings in DataProtection originating from EncryptedXml #47695
    8.0-preview5
  • AspNetCore.SignalR is reconnecting from client (angular 7) and then unable to receive latest message #47694
  • WithOpenApi IFormFile support is not generating valid swagger #47692
  • [Question/Issue?] Blazor Server CORS ? #47690
  • Google oauth2 An error was encountered while handling the remote login. #47689
  • Anchor tag href="#" shows incorrect link when mouse hover on the link #47687
    8.0-preview4
  • Obsolete KestrelServer (just the public type, not all of Kestrel!) #47686
  • Add blob() method to JS side of Blazor DotNetStreamReference #47685
    Backlog
  • What's considered not cacheable re: `AllowsCachingPolicies` #47677

Closed

  • Add a .http file to the API project template #47675
    8.0-preview4
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #47420
  • [Blazor-wasm] Smoother page navigation #47691
  • [8.0.100-preview.4.23211.1] Page doesn't show passed content when using NavigationManager.NavigateTo() #47683
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #45641
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [8.0.100-preview.4.23211.1] Anchor tag behavior changed when setting herf="#" in blazor app #47682
  • [Minimal API] Incorrect response when request body is too large #47525
    8.0-preview4
  • Add IHttpMetricsTagsFeature and IConnectionMetricsTagsFeature #47493
  • ASP.NET Core metrics #47536
  • Exit Kestrel heartbeat thread immediately on stop #47600
  • WebApplication.CreateSlimBuilder() should auto-register AuthN/Z middleware when associated services are added #47507
    8.0-preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Sync shared code from runtime #47684
    area-runtime
  • Log if request reaches the end of request pipeline #47681
    area-runtime
  • Diaganostics and metrics clean up #47679
    area-runtime
  • Log if a server certificate lacks the subjectAlternativeName extensions #47678
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Make heartbeat test tolerant of odd wait times #47688
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Specialize pipeline for MapRazorComponents #47649
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Add a .http file to API project template #47676
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4
  • [blazor] Configure mono runtime with startupMemoryCache and runtimeOptions #47670
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4
  • Add missing projects to Components.slnf #47680
    area-blazor
  • Return 400 bad request when IOException is thrown when ready form. #47584
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Use reset event in Kestrel heartbeat to quickly stop thread #47619
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Add [RequiresUnreferencedCode] attribute to top level APIs. #47663
    needs-area-label, 8.0-preview4
  • Register AuthN/Z middleware automatically in CreateSlimBuilder #47664
    area-runtime, area-hosting, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Update SDK #47540
    area-signalr
  • Add support for logging/throwing exceptions in RDG #47657
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, 7.0.x
  • Added enableRangeProcessing parameter to TypedResult.Stream(...) #47558
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add MapIdentity<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Reset ConnectProtocol during reset #47660
    area-runtime

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reference binding doesn't work on iOs #14577
  • OnPlatform & AppThemeBinding dynamic values not being utilized in controls #14575
  • Border control display bug in a Grid (Windows) #14573
  • WinUI: TabbedPage pages provided by a DataTemplate crash when swapping to a different tab. #14572
  • CarouselView position ignored #14569
  • SearchBar IsEnabled property not functioning #14566
  • DEP0700: Registration of the app failed. [0x80080204] error 0xC00CE014: App manifest validation error: The app manifest must be valid as per schema #14564
  • Entry Layout broken after Update .NET MAUI to 7.0.81 #14562
  • Android FlyoutPage problems when FlyoutPage::Flyout is a NavigationPage. #14561
    Backlog
  • Slow build -> deploy on iOS #14560
  • Secondary Order ToolbarItems not displayed correctly on iOS #14559
  • Custom Shell.TitleView content not positioned correctly on iOS #14558

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'SqliteConnection' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) #30686
  • Unneeded subquery and projection when using ordering without limit/offset in set operations #30684
  • Support `OfType<T>()` within `Include` expressions on base-class-typed collection navigations #30683
  • Occasional TextTemplatingModelGeneratorTest failure #30682
  • user-defined-function-mapping go to Learn instead of Github #30681

Closed

  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to track an entity of type 'Blueprint' because its primary key property 'Id' is null. #30657
  • Inconsistent results when querying DateTime stored as integer #30660
  • Cannot drop a column and add another one in the same migration when using temporal tables #30648
  • How to perform UPDATE query with multiple conditions? #30609
  • Substituting table reference for a CTE #30602
  • "dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold" should generate #nullable enable #30597
  • SQLNullValueException not raised on assignment of nullable column to value-type property #30583
  • Add support for STRING_SPLIT when using .Contains() #15593

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop pushing down to subquery for non-Concat set operations without limit/offset #30685

Updated

  • Fix to #30326 - Query: converter from bool used in predicate without comparison fails on sqlite (and other non-sql server backends?) #30666
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30664
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

entry.content:
